description: JSON file to be used to parse Xe documentation

_properties_.description: Contains the major group for the tested functionality, being hardware, software or firmware
Contains the mega feature for end to end use case, e. g. the 'sellable' feature.
Groups page table tests on buckets containg more detailed functionality
Defines what category of testlist it belongs
Defines the test category. Usually used at subtest level.
Defines Kernel parameters required for the test to run
If the test is used to solve an issue, point to the URL containing the issue.
Provides a list of GPUs not capable of running the subtest (or the test as a hole).
Describes any GPU-specific requrirement, like requiring multi-tiles.
List other subtests that are required to not be skipped before calling this one.
Point to known missing features at the test or subtest.
Provides a description for the test/subtest.
